productYields.description: Container to hold lists of \element{productYield}, including evaluated or processed yields.
productYields.name: productYields

label.description: Denotes the \attr{style} of the evaluated data.
label.name: label

nuclides.description: List of nuclide id's.  For spontaneous yields, all \element{elapsedTimes} use the same list of nuclides.
nuclides.name: nuclides

elapsedTimes.description: Container to hold lists of \element{elapsedTime} elements.
elapsedTimes.name: elapsedTimes

productYield.description: This element actually contains the yields, broken out by the time at which the yield is considered.
productYield.name: productYield

href.description: xPath link to another \element{nuclides} node, indicating to use the same list of nuclides.
href.name: href

bodyText: A space delimited list of nuclide id's (e.g. \attrval{Cu79 Cu80 ...}), arranged in the same order as the appropriate values
tabulated in the \element{values} container(s). For particle induced yields, the \element{values} container is co-located
with this \element{nuclide} container. For spontaneous yields, the \element{values} container is inside the appropriate \element{yields} container.
If the 'href' attribute is present, the body text must be empty.
description: List of nuclide id's, or href pointing to another \element{nuclides} node.
GNDS permits using a different list of nuclides for different incident energies and/or elapsed times, but also supports linking if the evaluator wishes to
use the same list of nuclides throughout.
nuclides.name: nuclides

elapsedTime.description: The collection of yield data corresponding to one time point.
elapsedTime.name: elapsedTime

elapsedTimes.description: Container to hold lists of \element{elapsedTime} elements.
elapsedTimes.name: elapsedTimes

label.description: This labels what the time element corresponds to, namely \attrval{initial} (e.g. independent) or \attrval{unspecified} (e.g. cumulative)
label.name: label

time.description: Time corresponding to yields in question.
time.name: time

yields.description: For spontaneous fission, this collects the yields.
yields.name: yields

incidentEnergies.description: For induced fission, this collects the data for each of the projectile's incident energies.  Contains the list of \element{incidentEnergy} elements.
incidentEnergies.name: incidentEnergies

description: The collection of yield data at a given time after fission. For spontaneous fission,
the \element{elapsedTime} node contains a \element{time} and a \element{yields} section.
For induced fission, each \element{elapsedTime} contains a \element{time} and
elapsedTime.name: elapsedTime

description: Time corresponding to the yields in question.  Generally yields with time of 0 s are scission yields,
times between 0 s and $10^{-14}$ s are independent fission yields and
those with longer times are cumulative yields.  Cumulative yields with an unspecified time are denoted
time.name: time

nuclides.description: List of nuclide id's or href pointing to another \element{nuclides} node.
nuclides.name: nuclides

values.description: The actual values, in the order given by the corresponding \element{nuclides} element.
values.name: values

uncertainty.description: Uncertainty/covariance on the actual values, in the order given by the corresponding \element{nuclides} element.
uncertainty.name: uncertainty

yields.description: Container for the nuclides and corresponding yield values. This node appears inside either a \element{elapsedTime} node (spontaneous fission) or \element{incidentEnergy} node (induced fission).
yields.name: yields

incidentEnergy.description: Yield data from one incident energy.
incidentEnergy.name: incidentEnergy

incidentEnergies.description: For induced fission, this collects the data for each of the projectile's incident energies.  Contains the list of \element{incidentEnergy} elements.
incidentEnergies.name: incidentEnergies

yields.description: Nuclides, yields and uncertainties for this elapsed time / incident energy.
yields.name: yields

incidentEnergy.description: Stores yield data for a single incident energy.
incidentEnergy.name: incidentEnergy
